title: Pension plan actuarial valuation reports
dataVerified: Plan actuary name, plan sponsor, participant demographics (aggregated), pension liabilities, funding status
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fabricated pension funding reports enabling underfunding fraud. Domain binding verifies credentialed actuary (FSA, EA, FIA). ERISA compliance for qualified pension plans. Multi-billion dollar pension obligations. IRS audit trail. Prevents underfunding fraud that threatens retiree benefits. Multi-page valuation reports benefit from per-page verification to prevent tampering with assumptions or results.
